0.title: Adult Dosing
0.mono:
• during the critical shortage of phosphate injection in the United States, the US Food and Drug Administration has authorized the importation and distribution of Glycophos(TM) sodium glycerophosphate sterile concentrate; call Fresenius Kabi USA Customer Service at 1-888-386-1300 for product availability and ordering.
  • 1 mL of sodium glycerophosphate contains 1 mmol of phosphate and 2 mmol (2 mEq) of sodium
  • Intravenous feeding of patient, Supplement for phosphate requirements: individualize; recommended dosage during IV nutrition is 10 to 20 mmol per day

1.title: Pediatric Dosing
1.mono:
• during the critical shortage of phosphate injection in the United States, the US Food and Drug Administration has authorized the importation and distribution of Glycophos(TM) sodium glycerophosphate sterile concentrate; call Fresenius Kabi USA Customer Service at 1-888-386-1300 for product availability and ordering
  • 1 mL of sodium glycerophosphate contains 1 mmol of phosphate and 2 mmol (2 mEq) of sodium
  • Intravenous feeding of patient, Supplement for phosphate requirements: (infant and neonates) individualize; recommended dosage during IV nutrition 1 to 1.5 mmol/kg/day

3.title: Indications
3.mono:
Non-FDA Labeled Indications
Intravenous feeding of patient, Supplement for phosphate requirements

9.title: Administration
9.mono:
Intravenous
  • vials are preservative-free; intended for single-use only
  • must dilute in high-volume infusion fluids and infuse over 8 hours or more; complete infusion within 24 hours
